div.p: Width of the column measured in fixed units or relative proportions. For fixed width, use a number followed by a unit. Possible unit values are "pt" for point, "cm" for centimeters, "in" for inches, etc. (e.g., "2in" for 2 inches). Proportional width can be indicated with a number and asterisk (e.g., "5*" for five times the proportion). All integers are positive. Use values that are appropriate to the software that governs the display of the resulting table such as a web browser or XSL format objects processor. Available in colspec.
